charinfo.name: Utakata (S)
charinfo.description: Utakata (S) is a missing nin from the Hidden Mist Village and the jinchuuriki for the six tailed slug Rokubi. A distant person most of the time Utakata (S) is a kind shinobi who uses bubble line ninjutsu in many ways.

abilities.name: Soap Bubble Ninjutsu
abilities.description: Utakata (S) uses his specialized Soap Bubble Ninjutsu to target one enemy. The target of this skill will lose all destructible defense and then take 15 piercing damage.

abilities.name: Drowning Bubble Technique
abilities.description: Utakata (S) uses Drowning Bubble Technique on one enemy dealing 10 affliction damage permanently. Soap Bubble Ninjutsu will deal an additional 5 damage to any enemy affected by this skill. This skill cannot be used on an enemy currently being affected by it. This skill ends when Utakata (S) dies.

abilities.name: Rokubi Transformation
abilities.description: Utakata (S) uses Rokubi Transformation effortlessly to heal himself for 25 health points and gain 50% unpierceable damage reduction for 1 turn.

abilities.name: Bubble Dome
abilities.description: This skill makes Utakata (S) invulnerable for 1 turn.
